name: GNs apparatus
description:
In a nutshell 

GNs apparatus is a game submission to the Godot Wild Jam #37

The game is just about mechanical steam punk styled game where you do simple tasks in each levels, more stuff gets shown to you the more you progress, there are cogs, cranks, valves, belts and more!

just a reminder that this is at its early stages so dont exept alot of stuff right now but I have big plans for this, I just dint have enough time to add them all since this game was made public beta in 9 days after the day I brainstormed this idea

 Question and Answer  what is this game?

the answer is in the "in a nutshell" part of this page

are there any plans for more stuff to be added?

yes, I have concepts of stuff ready to be made, and feel free to give your ideas also!

will there be a level editor?

its most likely yes, I would love to see what the community makes with it!

hidden controls?

yes but I dont think ill add any way to know this combinations but here they are currently:

Are there more features comming?

why not :)

F11toggle full screen and window mode  Credits 

GNamimates 
art,  sound, level, programing and author 

ParaLayzer
beta tester

 Note

at the time of the game public release, this is still at its early stages, most things are currently hard coded so dont expect alot of freedom in the game at the moment, I will dedicate my free time to updating this to add more things to do like the level editor and etc, also please consider helping the development of the game because right now im into rough time because of the "wonderful" year 2020-2021, your support MEANS to me ALOT, I mean ALOT so thankyou if you do :)

-GNamimates
